name: The Library
summary: The Library is a mysterious trove of old, an arcane structure that has stood since time immemorial. Aged, yet ageless. What will you find within its walls and amongst its countless tomes? This map is an experimental design philosophy I'll be trying out called "Environment Studies": making a focused effort to produce one high-fidelity scene, with a special emphasis on atmosphere or exploration, leaving other more traditional elements like progression or combat behind.
